name: Breakout
storyline: The story takes place in the early 21st century, between a group of lost teenagers and a behavior correctional center. Players enter the story from the perspective of the protagonist and goes deep into it with the characters.
summary: Breakout is a FMV narrative adventure game with interactive cinematic experience. The story is about a group of misguided youths, who are sent to a correctional center and try to escape.
